overview: From 2025-08-14 to 2025-08-15, ethereum-optimism/ethereum-optimism.github.io had 2 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 9 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Add $PAGE token to Superchain List w/ Logo
topPRs.author: ipfsnut
topPRs.body:
<!--
Contributions welcome! See https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Description**

<!--
Adding PageDAO's PAGE token to the Superchain Token List.

- Ethereum: 0x60e683C6514Edd5F758A55b6f393BeBBAfaA8d5e
- Base: 0xc4730f86d1F86cE0712a7b17EE919Db7dEFad7FE

PageDAO is a decentralized publishing platform for literary NFTs.-->

**Tests**

<!--
I'm just adding a logo to an existing Base token. 
-->

**Additional context**

<!--
$PAGE has been around since 2021, but it doesn't look very good on apps without a token logo. -->

**Metadata**

<!-- 
Include a link to any github issues that this may close in the following form:
- Fixes #[Link to Issue]
-->

topContributors.summary: blmalone: Drove a significant refactor today, merging a large PR in ethereum-optimism/superchain-ops (#1163) that removed legacy code, demonstrating a primary focus on refactoring work.
leopoldjoy: Focused on other work, modifying 3 files with 295 additions and 18 deletions across 1 commit, and provided 4 review comments and 1 PR comment.
ipfsnut: Focused on expanding the Superchain List by opening a PR to add the $PAGE token to ethereum-optimism/ethereum-optimism.github.io (#1186), and provided one comment on a pull request.

scagria: Focused on documentation improvements, opening PR #1185 "Add MITY" in ethereum-optimism/ethereum-optimism.github.io, which involved significant changes across 228 files with a net addition of over 7,000 lines, primarily in configuration files.
axelKingsley: Focused on various tasks, modifying 4 files with 3 commits (+72/-26 lines) and providing 1 review comment.
tessr: Focused on identifying and documenting a critical improvement for the `op-up` tool, creating issue ethereum-optimism/optimism#17076 to recognize and respond to standard CLI flags.
